title: T-Mobile Beat Competitors Again in Subscriber Growth. But Investors Are Getting Used to It.
text:
T-Mobile US continued to lead the U.S. wireless industry in customer growth in the third quarter, as it awaits a ruling on its merger with Sprint. The company signed up more monthly wireless subscribers than larger competitors Verizon Communications (ticker: VZ) and AT&T (T) combined, and raised its forecast for full-year additions for the second time in 2019.

description: T-Mobile US continued to lead the U.S. wireless industry in customer growth in the third quarter, adding 1.1 million postpaid wireless customers.
